title: Allow grouping on DoubleValuesSource ranges
description: LUCENE-7701 made it easier to define new ways of grouping results.  This issue adds functionality to group the values of a DoubleValuesSource into a set of ranges.

comments.content:
Here's a patch.  Still needs some javadocs.

The tests for this are pretty basic currently.  I'm going to try porting the randomized tests from TestGrouping to this, and make it easier to test new GroupSelectors, but I'll make that a separate issue.
comments.author: Alan Woodward

comments.content: Nice addition! Agreed that it lacks jdocs and more more thorough tests. Maybe also document this new way of grouping in package-info.java?
comments.author: Martijn van Groningen
